response.original_title: LEGO Marvel Avengers: Thanos & Earth's Mightiest Heroes Fight for the Last Time
response.overview: The Avengers are gearing up for the final battle against Thanos, but where’s Hulk? As tensions rise, Hulk faces off with a Leviathan — then, he softens when he recognises his old friend. Watch the LEGO Marvel action unfold with a surprising twist and plenty of humour!
response.title: LEGO Marvel Avengers: Thanos & Earth's Mightiest Heroes Fight for the Last Time

titles.title: LEGO Marvel Avengers: Hulk Joins the Final Battle Against Thanos!

results.name: LEGO Marvel Avengers: Thanos & Earth's Mightiest Heroes Fight for the Last Time
